html:
Egyptians are men, and not God; and their horses flesh, and not spirit. Isaiah points out the simple truth that Egypt and her horses cannot compare to God's power. Judah should trust in the strength of her God rather than in Egypt's military might.

Lord shall stretch out his hand. The Lord stretches forth his hand to punish (see commentary on 5:25).

both he that helpeth shall fall, and he that is helped. Reiterating the prophecy in 31:2, Isaiah says that both Judah and Egypt will be punished.
